text: was a Japanese politician of the Democratic Party of Japan. He was a member of the House of Representatives in the Diet from 1993 to 2000 and again from 2005 to 2012. He was born in Fukui, Japan. Sasaki died on 28 June 2022 from problems caused by a heart attack at a Fukui hospital, aged 65.笹木竜三・元文部科学副大臣が死去 福井県出身、65歳 , fukuishimbun.co.jp ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Fukui Prefecture
title: Ryuzo Sasaki
